title: Rito PLEASE Give Us Just ONE ALTERNATIVE ONE FOR ALL QUEUE
body:
Given how quick the queue is now, I'm pretty sure it wouldn't hurt to make a couple of queues. Seriously, queue time is like 10 seconds. Surely they can make more options then one blindpick/majority. It's really obnoxious when I've wanted to play wukong for 15 games in a row, and instead, see for the millionth time, Tahm/Lux/Darius/Malph/Brand/Blitz/Yasuo picks. Come on, this game mode has so much potential for variety. Don't people get tired of playing the same crap over and over? I go into this gamemode hoping I get a chance to try each champ once. Good luck with even getting a new one after the first 10% of champs are down. What you saw in the first 10 games is probably all you'll see. 

How hard can it possibly be to make a teambuild/draftpick/ANY-OTHER-CHOICE queue along side blindvote? I spam the heck out of this gamemode because, in PRINCIPLE, I love it. In practice, majority pick with no alternative ruins everything. This one aspect makes the gamemode feel like garbage sometimes. I'm about to post a thread on another option I've considered. But I don't care, for this thread, what people think about a particular alternative queue. I just want to know what people think about ANY alternative.

replies.body: All of my Friday matches had a lot of variety, although since most of them are LC$ mascots that built AD Offtank, I had a lot of losses
I find the first 20 rounds have plenty of variety, and then the rest are basically the same as the first 20. That's my problem. Maybe you had a ton of variety the first day. Shocker.
